unnormalised: The solar rooftop subsidies offered by MNRE are crucial for promoting adoption, particularly among middle-class families in places like Chennai. However, streamlining the application process, currently taking upwards of 6 months, is vital. Transparency regarding disbursal timelines (e.g., after 12/12/2024) and subsidy amounts (e.g., Rs. 20,000 for a 3kW system) needs improvement. Perhaps collaboration with institutions like IIT Delhi could enhance efficiency. We also need greater awareness campaigns, scheduled before 15/08/2024, at 10:00 hrs and 16:00 hrs daily, targeting Tier-II cities. Clear guidelines, available by 30/06/2024, will help prevent misuse and ensure equitable distribution in line with national energy goals.
